summary:
A school is a place where students learn under the guidance of teachers. It can be a building or an institution, and many countries have formal education systems. Primary schools teach young kids, while secondary schools educate teenagers. Universities offer higher education.

Some schools focus on specific fields like dance or economics. Private schools cater to unique educational needs or religious beliefs. Critics argue that traditional schools may limit creativity and natural curiosity. Homeschooling and distance learning are alternatives to regular schools.
title: School
